CustomField.formula:
( ( IF(TEXT(x1__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(x1__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X2__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X2__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X3__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X3__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X4__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X4__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X5__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X5__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X6__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X6__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X7__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X7__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X8__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X8__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X9__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X9__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X10__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X10__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X11__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X11__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X12__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X12__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X13__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X13__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X14__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X14__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X15__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X15__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X16__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X16__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X17__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X17__c)), 0) + IF(TEXT(X18__c) != null, VALUE(TEXT(X18__c)), 0) -
/* Subtrai 1 apenas se for "NC" */ IF(TEXT(O_IPVA_est_em_dias__c) = "NC", 1, 0) - IF(TEXT(Existem_multas_no_ve_culo__c) = "NC", 1, 0) ) / 90 ) * 100
CustomField.label: Pontuação geral
